meaningMnemonic: You find some <radical>white</radical> <radical>feathers</radical> and you want to <kanji>learn</kanji> more about where they came from and what they're made of.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>learn</kanji> that you should tie these white feathers to your <reading>shoe</reading>s (しゅう). You do it before you learn what it will do, and then suddenly you're jump-flying out of the building.
